name: Harit Dharaa Projects
overview:
Harit Dharaa creates lifestyle! The company focuses on developing contemporary structures that are aesthetically pleasing and blends utility with technology. We are a New Delhi-based real estate company, which has been upping the contemporary standards of living in modern India. With operations spanned across a number of cities across India, Harit Dharaa stands firm on the belief of marching towards ‘Parivartan Ki Aur’. We, by all means propagate the concept of green living, and are highly dedicated towards making earth a beautiful place to live in. Treading strongly with our environment-friendly concepts, Harit Dharaa is built around the needs of the people and works hard at maintaining our pro-environment stance, by coming up with new and innovative ways to sustain the human race in the future. With us, eco-friendly environment protection measures come as a standard. The name Harit Dharaa is synonymous with quality, reliability and a deep commitment towards our customers. All our properties are at par with the best in the world, and we promise to deliver to the highest specifications. Qualities such as strict business ethics, efficient management, on-time project completion abilities and employee-friendly atmosphere, have given us the recognition of piloting the property development space on a pan-India basis. In our endeavour to embrace social responsibility, we have efficiently adopted the green building concept. Our one-of-its-kind features in all our properties are energy efficient optimization, conserving natural resources and developing healthier spaces for our occupants.
